items.headline: U.S. stock futures little changed as investors eye possible government shutdown
items.summary_en: U.S. stock-market futures were flat late Sunday, as investors wait and see whether there’ll be a government shutdown later this week.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Tesla is about to show a snapshot of its global sales. Is recent optimism deserved?
items.summary_en: Wall Street sales consensus has crept up, but some worry that a sales bump, if it comes, will be more about a rush to buy EVs ahead of expiring U.S. tax incentives.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘He can’t afford payments to the IRS’: My friend’s $19,000 loan was written off. The IRS charged him $3,000. What can he do?
items.summary_en: “He has only been able to make about $10,000 a year in menial jobs.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I haven’t filed taxes in 20 years’: I’m 55 and about to get laid off. I’ve $1 million in crypto. Am I in big trouble?
items.summary_en: “I have $800,000 split across two 401(k) plans and a $69,000 lump-sum pension.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I inherited $600K in Apple stock. It now makes up 50% of my portfolio. Is that too risky?
items.summary_en: “I worry that a downturn in the tech sector, or something Apple-specific, could wipe out half my portfolio.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The last thing the stock market wants right now is a government shutdown. Here’s why.
items.summary_en: Stocks are defying their typical weakness in September — but it isn’t October yet

items.headline: ‘I thought she was honest’: My ex-wife hid stocks during our divorce. Can I sue her?
items.summary_en: “I have contacted her about it, but she refuses to answer my calls.”

items.headline: My former mother-in-law left a $1 million estate. Can I sue my ex-husband for a share of it?
items.summary_en: “My mother-in-law did not leave me anything in her will, but she should have.”

items.headline: People keep pushing bitcoin on me, but it crashes regularly. What am I missing?
items.summary_en: How is owning crypto better portfolio management when U.S. stocks have come through every crisis?

items.headline: My wife and I are in our 40s. We have a $600K mortgage and $500K income. Can we afford a vacation home?
items.summary_en: “We plan to work another 20 years and we estimate $3-$4 million in 401(k) savings.”
